/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with tall buildings, their red and white facades standing out against the blue sky. The buildings are adorned with numerous windows and balconies, hinting at the bustling city life within. On the right side of the street, trees and bushes add a touch of greenery, contrasting with the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
